property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the PagesPanel (a Application).

property.name: index
property.shortdesc: The index of the PagesPanel within its containing object.

property.name: pagesViewSetting
property.shortdesc: View setting for how to arrange the pages in the page section of the panel.

property.name: masterVerticalView
property.shortdesc: If true, master page icons will be arranged vertically around the binding spine. If false, master page icons will be arranged horizontally.

property.name: resizeBehavior
property.shortdesc: Specifies the behavior of the document and master page areas of the panel when the panel is resized.

property.name: pagesOnTop
property.shortdesc: If true, the pages area of the panel will be drawn above the master pages area.

property.name: pagesThumbnails
property.shortdesc: If true, display thumbnails of the pages in the pages area of the panel.

property.name: mastersThumbnails
property.shortdesc: If true, display thumbnails of the pages in the master pages area of the panel.

property.name: transparencyIcons
property.shortdesc: If true, a transparency icon will display next to spreads with elements having transparency applied.

property.name: transitionsIcons
property.shortdesc: If true, a page transitions icon will display next to spreads with page transitions applied.

property.name: rotationIcons
property.shortdesc: If true, a rotation icon will display next to spreads with non-zero rotation applied.

property.name: visible
property.shortdesc: If true, the panel is visible.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the PagesPanel.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
